column2: "Oh! Oh! Miko-sama! It's Miko-sama!"
"Oh! The translations are working! But... What do you mean by \"Miko-sama\"?"
"Miko-sama is Miko-sama, aren't you? More importantly, Miko-sama, those insolent Kuronians have..."
"No. Er, um... I'm sorry!"
"Stop. Can't you see you're troubling them?"
"Kotoshiro."
"Messages to Miko-sama will go through me, Miko-sama's guardian. That is what we have agreed upon, is it not?"
"Ku... I understand."
"Please pardon me, Miko-sama."
"Umm... Thank you. But I'm not that \"Miko-sama\" he mistook me for."
"I understand."
"More importantly, there is something I have to ask. Have you met a bossy lady that's about your size?"
"Bossy... lady? I haven't met someone like that... What about you, <%me>?"
"1. No idea."
"2. Is that the so called [Miko-sama]?"
"I see... I was sure this is where she was last seen. Have I made a mistake? I still have much to learn."
"If ever does she cross your sights, I would appreciate it if you let I, Kotoshiro, know."
"Correct. If ever does she cross your sights, I would appreciate it if you let I, Kotoshiro, know."
"...He's gone. I wonder if I can call him Kotoshiro-san?"
"Compared to the others, he seems to give off a different aura."
"Hmm... If it's with him, we will be able to hold a proper conversation."
"Shironian"
